title: LEGO for grownups
description: LEGO blocks: playtime mainstay for industrious kids, obsession for many (ahem!) mature adults. Hillel Cooperman takes us on a trip through the beloved bricks' colorful, sometimes oddball grownup subculture, featuring CAD, open-source robotics and a little adult behavior.
author: Hillel Cooperman
keywords: TED, talks, children, design, entertainment, entrepreneur, gaming, toy
